caption:
“Night prayer in the heart of silence.”

Reflection:
Darkness deepens devotion; silence turns into song. In the still hours, faith becomes pure light.

Commentary:
This reflection portrays night as sacred — a time when solitude and prayer weave together. Quiet devotion becomes radiant strength.
